name: canvas-text-block
description: Easily render a wrapping block of text in an HTML Canvas Element.

scripts.rename-ncc-output-file: node -e "require('fs').rename('dist/index.js', 'dist/canvasTextBlock.js', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.build: ncc build ./src/canvasTextBlock.ts --minify --out dist --target es2015 && npm run rename-ncc-output-file

author: Blake Wilson (https://blake.id)
